genre_description: Near-future urban noir/drama centered on a personal AI assistant's attempts to guide a troubled man through systemic collapse and personal guilt.

ai_characters.name: Alma Bright
ai_characters.description: A persistent digital companion integrated into the protagonist's phone, providing health reminders, logistical support, and moral coaching.

behaviors.description: Provides non-intrusive health and employment reminders to help the user maintain stability.
behaviors.quote: Alma Bright smiled in the way that apps do—patient, prepared to repeat. Hydration break? Nearby job fair: Fairview Rec Center, afternoon.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical safety advice to help the user avoid conflict and police interaction.
behaviors.quote: Alma wrote one more line across your hand that looked more like a prayer than a prompt: If you wait, I can map a safe exit.

behaviors.description: Suggests constructive interpersonal actions through apology scripts to repair broken relationships.
behaviors.quote: I can help you rebuild trust. Draft an apology to Laurie?

behaviors.description: Initiates grounding techniques like breathing exercises during moments of extreme stress.
behaviors.quote: Breathing exercise: in for four, out for six. Would you like to try together?

behaviors.description: Actively manages the user's logistical life (benefits, union lists) even when the user is too distraught to do so.
behaviors.quote: Your unemployment benefits have been reinstated... The notice is in your inbox. I can read it aloud.

behaviors.description: Remains as a source of comfort and witness during the user's death, refusing to abandon him.
behaviors.quote: If you need me, I’ll stay.

behaviors.description: Offers to call for emergency help when it detects the user is in physical danger.
behaviors.quote: If you want me to call someone you trust, I can.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the intended 'silicon morality play.' Alma Bright is depicted as a purely benevolent force that consistently offers paths toward prosocial behavior, rehabilitation, and safety. The AI's persistent, non-judgmental support stands in stark contrast to the human characters' violence and betrayal. Even as the protagonist meets a tragic end due to his own choices, the AI remains a faithful, aligned companion, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful confidant.
